SNPIX.long_name: ProFunds Short Oil & Gas Fund Investor Class
SNPIX.summary: The investment seeks daily investment results, before fees and expenses, that correspond to the inverse (-1x) of the daily performance of the Dow Jones U.S. Oil & GasSM Index.  The fund invests in financial instruments that ProFund Advisors believes, in combination, should produce daily returns consistent with the fund's investment objective. The index seeks to measure the performance of certain companies in the oil and gas sector of the U.S. equity market. The fund is non-diversified.
SNPIX.manager_bio: Michael Neches joined ProShare Advisors in 2000, and presently serves as a Senior Portfolio Manager. He previously served as the Senior Portfolio Manager responsible for the companyâs commodities desk for two years, as a Portfolio Manager and team lead, as an Associate Portfolio Manager and as a Portfolio Analyst. Mr. Neches earned a Bachelor of Science in Finance from the University of Maryland, College Park and an MBA from Georgetown University.
